cards.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2007/04/465520249_7eab3b1976.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/465520249/ "photo sharing") [Adnams Sign, Halesworth](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/465520249/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
And, while I probably won’t get a pint of Adnams, you’ll find me in the pub on Friday night for the [Lewisham Bloggers’ Drinks](http://andrewkbrown.wordpress.com/2007/04/12/meet-up-reminder/). Be there, or be elsewhere.
